title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
description: When changing the source folder and output location settings in the project properties, it should be possible to set them together as one operation instead of separate operations.
OB: The current behavior does not allow setting the source folder and output location together.
EB: The user should be able to set the source folder and output location together in one operation.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a project with the 'src' folder set as the source folder and the 'bin' folder set as the output location.
2. Go to the project properties.
3. Change the settings to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location.
